hero.title: Master Any Subject with
hero.description: Learn faster and remember longer with our intelligent spaced repetition system. Create, study, and track your progress with beautifully designed flashcards.

features.title: Everything you need to learn effectively
features.description: Our app combines proven learning techniques with modern technology to help you achieve your learning goals.

spacedRepetition.title: Spaced Repetition
spacedRepetition.description: Intelligent algorithm that shows you cards just before you forget them, maximizing retention and minimizing study time.

progressTracking.title: Progress Tracking
progressTracking.description: Monitor your learning streaks, success rates, and daily progress with detailed analytics and insights.

responsiveDesign.title: Responsive Design
responsiveDesign.description: Study anywhere, anytime. Our app works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

keyboardShortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
keyboardShortcuts.description: Learn faster with intuitive keyboard navigation. Flip cards and rate them without touching your mouse.

deckManagement.title: Deck Management
deckManagement.description: Organize your flashcards into decks by category. Import cards in bulk or create them one by one.

studySessions.title: Study Sessions
studySessions.description: Track your study time and analyze your most productive hours to optimize your learning schedule.

howItWorks.title: Simple, yet powerful
howItWorks.description: Get started in minutes and see results in days

step1.title: Create Your Decks
step1.description: Organize your learning material into themed decks. Add cards manually or import them in bulk.

step2.title: Study Smart
step2.description: Review cards using our spaced repetition algorithm. Rate your confidence and let the system optimize your schedule.

step3.title: Track Progress
step3.description: Monitor your learning journey with detailed analytics and maintain your study streaks.

cta.title: Ready to supercharge your learning?
cta.description: Join our early group of learners who are already using our platform to master new skills and knowledge.
